text: Kintu etiya ami apnikhan ke likha to utu manu khan logote namilibi jun tai nijorke ekjon bhai nisena koi kintu jun bebichar ase, nohoile lalchi ase, nohoile murti puja kora, nohoile kotha pora biya gali kora, nohoile nisa pani kore, nohoile manu ke thogai diye. Eneka manu logote kha luwa bhi na koribi.
